data.title: Where to Buy Native Plants – Wild Seed Project
data.meta_description: Returning native plants to the Maine landscape
data.text:
Maine

Bas Rouge Farm & Forge

Orono, ME

Bas Rouge Farm & Forge offers a variety of native plants to suit different soil, sun, and watering considerations. Plants and seeds are grown using Coast of Maine products, are neonicotinoids free and pollinator friendly. Additionally, they offer classes and workshops on native plant gardening and sustainability within the home & business landscape.

Blue Aster Native Plants

South China, ME

Retail nursery that propagates organic, seed-grown native perennials and shrubs. Wholesale prices may be available for professionals.

Burnt Meadow Nursery

Brownfield, ME

Wholesale only. Family-owned native propagation nursery and certified organic blueberry farm. Specializes in native trees and shrubs grown from local seeds and cuttings.

Ellsworth Garden Club

Ellsworth, ME

Annual spring plant sale.

Fedco Trees

Clinton, ME

Most plants are Maine-grown, with a substantial selection of native bare-root trees, shrubs and some native herbaceous species. Mail order autumn through winter for spring shipment. Not exclusively native, but a great local cooperative with growers that supply mostly organically grown plants.

Fernwood

Montville, ME

Family-owned nursery that specializes in propagating woodland and shade-tolerant plants. Not exclusively native, and they grow many cultivars and exotic plants, so ask for their selection of natural native species.

Knox-Lincoln Soil and Water Conservation District

Rockport, ME

Annual spring plant sale. Mostly natives.

Maine Audubon

Falmouth & Holden, ME

Annual late-spring and summer native plants for sale. Order online for curbside pick-up June through August at Gilsland Farm in Falmouth and Fields Pond in Holden.

Native Gardens of Blue Hill

Blue Hill, ME

Annual spring native plant sale.

Native Haunts

Alfred, ME

Small nursery selling seed-grown Maine native trees, shrubs, perennials and seeds. No pesticides or chemical fertilizers used.

Pierson Nurseries

Biddeford, ME

Wholesale only. A large, traditional horticultural nursery that has expanded to include many native species, especially trees and shrubs. Since they sell many cultivars and exotic plants, ask for their seed-grown native species and request pesticide free plants.

Rebel Hill Farm

Liberty, ME

Small family-owned nursery that sells field-grown and certified organic perennials and specializes in native plants and medicinal herbs. Plants are also sold through other vendors: Belfast Co-op, Urban Gardens in Topsham, Eldridge Lumber in York, Sheepscot General, and Sprague’s Nursery in Bangor.

Rebel Hill Farm sometimes co-hosts native plant sales. Visit their website for more information.

Ripley Farm

Dover-Foxcroft, ME

Family-owned organic farm that grows native perennial plants for sale through pre-orders, an annual plant sale and wholesale through Fedco. They hope to soon sell native perennials online, to be shipped throughout Maine. Not exclusively native.

Rooted Elements

Montville, Maine

Rooted Elements is a peat-free plant nursery offering seed-grown native plants and other non-native perennials for the garden.

Sweetfern Maine

Cape Neddick, ME

Small nursery that grows native perennials for sale through online orders (primarily email) for local delivery and nearby farmers markets. Over 40 species of seed-grown herbaceous and woody plants are available as individual containers or plug flats. Check out an up-to-date availability list online.

5 Star Orchard

Brooklin, ME

Certified organic fruit tree and seed-grown native perennial nursery.

Wells Reserve at Laudholm

Wells, ME

Volunteer-run plant sales support projects including: maintaining the native plant gardens, all-seasons garden, and providing educational workshops. Over 30 species of seed-grown native wildflowers sold.
